column5: got this beast off the dock earlier in the week biggest bass i caught out of sturgeon.  been having a great year on strike king plastics this fish was on a ragetail space monkey
Damn thats a big bucket! Any measurements?
Nice fish, this is the time of the year that you can get some real pigs if you're willing to battle the elements!
man! that's a big bucket mouth!  Congrats!
Very nice Ernie!!! You know they are good when you can make your fist disappear
Really nice!  What do you think it weighs?
Did you catch it from the back of your truck? Looks like he's still on the lure. Nice fish btw
That is a tank!  Very nice 'warthas' fish.
Wowzers!   That's a pb to be very proud of!!   Congrats.

Amazing largemouth, Sturgeon gave me one over 5 last September, awesome lake for sure. Yours looks bigger tho  Must of been nice pitching baits and locking into that one  Thanks for sharing,  MTBF  Edit* Hope it went back into the drink

i don't know i just find it insulting to be told to have let that fish go, it may be that attitude the last few years that keeps the 350 pics or so in my computer and camera unshared. It should be obvious the bait and 1 oz tungsteen weight is still in its mouth, I ran up my steps and the 50 ft to the house to get quick pictures to run this impressive fish back into the lake, as fish like this deserves to be caught more than once. as for weight it was a 6 or bigger, wasn't keeping it out of the water longer than i had to decision was photo or weigh it. here is a pic from earlier in the year big bass was 5.1 on the digi before i sent them on there way.
